title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chat, file uploads, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama written in Go, with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models (Windows/Mac/Linux).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama, available on NuGet as ‘Ollama’.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to bring Ollama completions into Slack channels/threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU Ollama setups including WebUI.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of community-submitted Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, etc.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single Python notebook.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to any local Ollama model with session memory.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI Mac app that wraps the Ollama REST API for native macOS experience.
